summary: This document appears to be a development progress package for Little St. James Island, detailing construction or renovation work on cabanas, pavilions, a pool, and a screening room. It includes a planting plan and is associated with an address in California.

persons.name: Ron
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of a development progress package for Little St. James Island, possibly as a point of contact or recipient of the document.

events.title: Development Progress Package Submission
events.description: A development progress package for Little St. James Island was created or submitted, detailing work on cabanas, pavilions, a pool, and a screening room, including a planting plan.

keyFacts: On June 4, 2009, a development progress package was created for Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little St. James.
The package detailed construction or renovation work on cabanas, pavilions, a pool, and a screening room.
The document includes a planting plan, indicating landscaping work was part of the development.
The document is associated with a California address (90405), suggesting Epstein's network or contractors extended to the West Coast.
